people who can't hear are not as good as the rest of us,people who can't hear have hearing impairment,people who can't hear belong to physically disabled people,people who can't hear are perceived as stupid,
nonwhite individuals are not white individuals,nonwhite individuals should not be in white countries,
unspecified individuals make fun of physically disabled folks,unspecified individuals mock physically disabled folks,unspecified individuals are victims of black folks,
the blind are used as a comparison for driving ability,
being blind is a type of physical illness/disorder,

Examples:

Answer:
